[Vanderbilt sleep experts offer tips to adjust to this weekend's time change](https://news.vumc.org/2016/11/01/vanderbilt-sleep-experts-offer-tips-to-adjust-to-this-weekends-time-change/) Nov. 1, 2016—When daylight saving time ends at 2 a.m. on Sunday, Nov. 6, we set clocks back one hour, and essentially gain an extra hour of sleep—but that extra hour of sleep comes at the price of early evening darkness.
